curam.util.persistence.helper
Class LinkTableImpl<S extends DeepCloneable,L extends StandardEntity,R extends StandardEntity>

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.persistence.helper.EntityImpl
      curam.util.persistence.helper.SingleTableEntityImpl<S>
          curam.util.persistence.helper.LinkTableImpl<S,L,R>
Type Parameters:
S - The generated Curam "dtls" struct which holds a row of data from the physical database table.
L - The type of the "left-hand side" related entity.
R - The type of the "right-hand side" related entity.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity<java.lang.Long>, EntityInfoSetter<java.lang.Long,SingleTableEntityImpl<S>,S>, LinkTable<L,R>, Insertable, Modifiable, OptimisticLockable, OptimisticLockModifiable, OptimisticLockRemovable, Removable, StandardEntity, Validator
public abstract class LinkTableImpl<S extends DeepCloneable,L extends StandardEntity,R extends StandardEntity>
extends SingleTableEntityImpl<S>
implements LinkTable<L,R>

Standard implementation of LinkTable, where the link information is stored on a single database table without optimistic lock support.

          Protected no-arg constructor for use by concrete classes.

Constructor Detail

LinkTableImpl

protected LinkTableImpl()
Protected no-arg constructor for use by concrete classes. Concrete classes should have a private no-arg constructor for use only by Guice.

Method Detail

getLHS

protected abstract L getLHS()
Gets the "left-hand side" entity contributing to the relationship. Implementations must override this method to return the instance of the LHS entity contributing to the link relationship.

Returns:
the "left-hand side" entity contributing to the relationship

getRHS

protected abstract R getRHS()
/** Gets the "right-hand side" entity contributing to the relationship. Implementations must override this method to return the instance of the RHS entity contributing to the link relationship.

Returns:
the "right-hand side" entity contributing to the relationship

insert

public void insert()
            throws InformationalException
Locks both sides of the relationship whilst the link is inserted. This prevents other users from making changes to links from either entity whilst the insertion of this link occurs (which may be important if validation of the action requires retrieval of other links for the these entities).

Specified by:
insert in interface Insertable
Overrides:
insert in class EntityImpl
Throws:
InformationalException - TODO: JavaDoc.
See Also:
Insertable

remove

public void remove()
            throws InformationalException
Locks both sides of the relationship whilst the link is removed. This prevents other users from making changes to links from either entity whilst the removal of this link occurs (which may be important if validation of the action requires retrieval of other links for the these entities).

Specified by:
remove in interface Removable
Overrides:
remove in class EntityImpl
Throws:
InformationalException - TODO: JavaDoc.
See Also:

setNewInstanceDefaults

public void setNewInstanceDefaults()
Sets default values for new instances which have not yet been inserted onto the database..
